casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwan ANTHONY 324A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 16, 2017 *878Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellant Defender, Jonathan E. Broun, Attorney at Law, for Anthony, Antwan. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of June 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to Prepare Trial Transcript:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of June 2017."

Court reporter shall have up to and including the 21st day of July 2017 to prepare and deliver transcript to counsel.
